title: Focus on Simplicity
text: Ensure that the visualization is not cluttered with unnecessary elements.

title: Labeling Importance
text: Labels should be clear and concise to enhance understanding.

title: Avoid Jargon
text: Using complex jargon can confuse the audience and reduce clarity.

title: Consistent Formatting
text: Maintain consistent formatting throughout the visualization for better readability.

hintAnswer: Use clear and concise labels for all axes and data points.
title: Choose the Best Practice
text: Select the option that emphasizes clarity through labeling.
choices: Use complex jargon to demonstrate expertise.
Use clear and concise labels for all axes and data points.
Avoid using labels to keep the visualization clean.
